para.para: Writes the number of data units to be transferred on the DMAy Streamx.

entry.para: where y can be 1 or 2 to select the DMA and x can be 0 to 7 to select the DMA Stream.
Number of data units to be transferred (from 0 to 65535) Number of data items depends only on the Peripheral data format.

note.title: Note
note.para: If Peripheral data format is Bytes: number of data units is equal to total number of bytes to be transferred.
If Peripheral data format is Half-Word: number of data units is equal to total number of bytes to be transferred / 2.
If Peripheral data format is Word: number of data units is equal to total number of bytes to be transferred / 4.
In Memory-to-Memory transfer mode, the memory buffer pointed by DMAy_SxPAR register is considered as Peripheral.

entry.para: number of remaining data units in the current DMAy Streamx transfer.
